title: Channels
description: Channels are... You can do this with them... They're cool because...

items.title: AI For Good
items.teaser: AI for Good is an initiative to promote the use of artificial intelligence for good causes.
items.description: [AI for Good](https://ai4good.org) is an initiative to promote the use of artificial intelligence for taking action on the UN SDGs such as fighting poverty, climate change, improving healthcare, etc. The AI for Good Commons channel is aimed at helping scale AI for Good by enabling open datasets to be published and shared and connecting AI problem owners with problem solvers.
